text: Soni chilikati chao (cha ŵandu ŵa ku Mbepo ni ŵa ku Moto), chipakaŵe pana uŵigo (chachili chikwesya), soni pachanya pa chikwesya, paachiŵa pana ŵandu (ŵakulandana itendo yao yambone ni yakusakala) ŵachachiŵa ali nkwamanyilila wosope (ŵandu ŵa ku Mbepo ni ŵa ku Moto) ni imanyilo yao. Ni tachaŵilanga ŵandu ŵa ku Mbepo (achitiji): “Ntendele uŵe kukwenu.” Chachiŵa nkanajijinjile (Mbepojo) nambo ali akwete tama (janti tajijinjile)
